name: Grid Conqueror
description:
Break through the walls of the gridlands and become the ultimate Grid Conqueror!

Theme: Be Free

Diversifiers

Game Mechanics
-Variations under a team: the game must reutilize an element, as a scenario, mechanic or character, through the entire game.

Art
-Abstraction: The game must have only assets that don't represent characters
-Statue: the games must have reducted animation on none, using only visual effects.

Sound Design
-Music and Action: Part of the soundtrack must be generated while the game is active.

Extras
-Run!: The game must use time as an important factor

San Liljeholm Wik - Sound design, Graphics
Kurt Areskoug - Programming
Erik Gudmundson - Music
